channel.title: The Dreaming Tower Archives
channel.description: Tales from the Digital Realm — Cybersecurity wisdom through fantasy storytelling. Follow the Secret Council of the Kingdom of Cipheria as they defend against threats that mirror our modern digital challenges.

item.title: The Choice Between Walls
item.description: The Unraveler doesn't breach systems—it unravels the trust that holds them together. When subtle inconsistencies begin spreading through the Kingdom's records, Queen Lyra faces three impossible choices: quarantine and cripple the Kingdom, hunt openly and accelerate the doubt, or use the forbidden Forgetting Protocol to reset everyone's memory and hunt the entity in secret.
item.tower:featuring: Queen Lyra, The Lorekeeper, Valdris, Cassia & Shade
item.tower:lorekeeperNote: When two walls crack at once, there is no wisdom that saves both. There is only the Queen, the choice, and the dawn that reveals what was lost.

item.title: The Breach at Merchant's Gate
item.description: A routine security assessment reveals how a single compromised credential can cascade through interconnected systems. The Secret Council must balance commerce and security as darkness spreads through the trade networks.
item.tower:featuring: The Lorekeeper, Queen Lyra, Valdris & Cassia
item.tower:lorekeeperNote: A single key, carelessly kept, can open more doors than its holder ever imagined. The merchants learned this lesson at great cost.
